feed.title: Cleanuperr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.6.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update docs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/138
  • Add rate limiting for download removal by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/141

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.6.7...v1.6.8

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: Cleanuparr v2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update blacklist by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/155
  • Cleanuparr v2 by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v1.6.8...v2.0.0

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: Cleanuparr v2.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix old category being the same as the new category when handling unlinked downloads for qBit by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/172

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: Cleanuparr v2.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix base paths being incorrectly configured for download clients by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2
